summary:
This is only a book that describes the races in Skyrim. It have small description and pictures from male/female on each race.
When you read the book you earn +1 speech.
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone, this is my first attempt to make a mod and publish it.

This is only a book that describes the races in Skyrim. It have small description and pictures from male/female on each race.
When you read the book you earn +1 speech.

- Location of the book:
The book is in Whiterun, Farengar's study attached to the main hall of Dragonsreach, its in the table of the small room left when you enter the study.

Very simple, but it toke me some time to learn and to make it.
I hope you like it.

v1.1 Update 2014-03-15
-Add Small description text after the name of the race.
-Add Description of each race between the characteristics and the pictures of each race.
-Small changes in the alignment of the text on some parts of the book.

My other mod "Skyrim Creatures Book"

Leave any comments you want, i would like that.
author: Universus1
